title: EU could force WhatsApp, Messenger, iMessage and others to offer interoperability
content:
The EU has agreed upon new laws to limit the market power of big tech. Its new Digital Markets Act (DMA) aims to blacklist anti-competitive practices and force popular messaging services like WhatsApp, Messenger, iMessage, and others to open up and interoperate with smaller messaging platforms. The EU’s press release on the matter states: “During

The post EU could force WhatsApp, Messenger, iMessage and others to offer interoperability appeared first on xda-developers.
description: EU's proposed Digital Markets Act could force large messaging platforms like WhatsApp, iMessage, and Messenger to offer interoperability.
